scripts.prepublish: npm run test:cov && npm run build
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json &&  cp package-publish.json ./dist/package.json && cp README-pack.md ./dist/README.md
scripts.pack: npm run build && cd dist && npm pack
scripts.publish:patch: npm run prepublish && cd dist && npm version $(semver $(npm show . version) --increment -i patch) && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run prepublish && cd dist && npm version $(semver $(npm show . version) --increment -i minor) && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run prepublish && cd dist && npm version $(semver $(npm show . version) --increment -i major) && npm publish
scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo 'USE script "npm run publish:patch" (or minor/major)
' && false
